newsitem.title: INDIA: India silver higher with world market, gold steady.
newsitem.headline: India silver higher with world market, gold steady.

text.p: ** Silver (.999) opened 70 rupees higher at 6,400 rupees per kg on the back of an upsurge in the world market.
** Gold 24 carat opened steady at 4,530 rupees per 10 grammes, with business thin as the world market stayed quiet.
** Gold biscuit (116.64 gramme) opened steady at 53,000 rupees per piece after gaining 100 rupees on Thursday.
